text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ojo kasonero nadidī, ki [dar Makka] ʙa onho gufta şud: "[Aknun] Dast az çang ʙardored va namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed", va [-le] cun [dar Madina] çihod ʙar onon muqarrar şud, on goh gurūhe az eşon az mardum [-i muşriki Makka] tarsidand, monandi tars az Alloh taolo jo [hatto] ʙeştar va guftand: "Parvardigoro, caro çihodro ʙar mo muqarrar namudī? Caro ʙa mo to muddati kūtohe muhlat nadodī [to az ne'mathoi dunjavī ʙahramand gardem]"? [Ba onon] Bigū: "Barxūrdorī [az lazzathoi in] dunjo nociz ast va ʙaroi kase, ki parhezkor ʙoşad, saroi oxirat ʙehtar ast va [dar on ço] kucaktarin sitame ʙa şumo naxohad şud
